summary: Data Manager feature testing complete. All backend APIs working (13/13 tests passed). Frontend UI correctly displays all 8 modules with collection counts, admin protection notice, expand/collapse functionality, and confirmation dialogs. Data Manager appears under MANAGEMENT group and old Data Cleanup removed from sidebar.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/data-manager/stats returns 200 with all 8 modules (pinpanclub, sysbook, store, users, wallets, memberships, community, crm)
Backend: GET /api/data-manager/stats returns collection-level counts with labels for each module
Backend: GET /api/data-manager/stats returns _meta.admin_user_count
Backend: POST /api/data-manager/clear with confirm=false returns 400 (safety check)
Backend: POST /api/data-manager/clear without module or collections returns 400
Backend: POST /api/data-manager/clear with invalid module returns 404
Backend: POST /api/data-manager/clear with confirm=true clears specified collections
Backend: Auth_users collection protects admin accounts (is_admin=true)
Backend: POST /api/data-manager/seed-demo seeds demo data successfully (returns 200)
Backend: All endpoints require authentication (401/403 for unauthenticated)
Frontend: Data Manager page loads at /admin#data-manager
Frontend: Data Manager title and subtitle displayed correctly
Frontend: All 8 module cards displayed with correct labels and icons
Frontend: Module cards show total record counts (829 total records displayed)
Frontend: Admin protection notice shows '4 admin account(s) are protected'
Frontend: Refresh button present and functional
Frontend: Seed Demo Data button present and functional
Frontend: Module expansion works - clicking shows individual collections
Frontend: Each collection shows name, MongoDB collection name, and count
Frontend: Clear module button appears on each module card
Frontend: Clear collection button appears on hover for each collection row
Frontend: Confirm deletion dialog appears before clearing
Frontend: Dialog shows correct warning message with record count
Frontend: Cancel and Delete Permanently buttons work in dialog
Frontend: Data Manager appears under MANAGEMENT group in sidebar (line 186 AdminDashboard.jsx)
Frontend: Old Demo Data module still accessible at /admin#demo (backwards compatibility)
Frontend: Data Cleanup removed from sidebar navigation (not in navGroups array)
critical_code_review_comments: Code structure is clean with MODULE_COLLECTIONS mapping in data_manager_routes.py
Admin protection logic properly implemented - queries is_admin=true users and excludes from deletion
PROTECTED_COLLECTIONS set prevents accidental deletion of system config collections
Frontend DataManagerModule.jsx uses proper data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
Proper error handling with toast notifications for API failures
context_for_next_testing_agent: Data Manager module combines Demo Data and Data Cleanup into single unified interface. Backend routes at /api/data-manager/* (stats, clear, seed-demo). Frontend component at /app/frontend/src/modules/admin/DataManagerModule.jsx. Sidebar entry under MANAGEMENT group with id='data-manager'. Old Demo Data still accessible at #demo for backwards compatibility. Data Cleanup removed from sidebar but render handler remains for direct URL access.
